aboutString:
Hey there! I'm a software engineer with a passion for solving problems through programming. I enjoy optimizing code,
 improving user experiences, and developing innovative new features. I love exploring different programming languages and tools,
 and I'm always looking for ways to improve my craft. I'm excited to bring my problem-solving skills
 and efficiency-driven mindset to your organization and work collaboratively to build amazing things.

experienceData.subtitle: Lead Developer
experienceData.description:
• Developed and Designed overall project idea, goals, and architecture.
• Conducted research and evaluation of libraries, algorithms, and API’s to improve the overall performance and functionality of the software.
• Implemented audio manipulation systems and GUI using the pedalboard library in Python.
• Integrated and worked on a hand gesture recognition model to control audio effects in real time with opencv in Python.

experienceData.subtitle: Project Manager / UI/UX Designer
experienceData.description:
• Led a team of 4 software developers in creating a laser tag game management system.
• Developed and maintained the front-end design using the Python library pygame.
• Collaborated with team members to implement and improve UI and data management features.
• Utilized waterfall development methodologies to ensure timely and efficient project completion.

educationData.name: University of Arkansas
educationData.subtitle: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
educationData.score: Relevant Coursework: Programming Paradigms, Software Engineering, Intro to Artificial Intelligence, Formal Languages and Computability, Database Management Systems, OS/Computer Networks, Information Security

projectsData.name: Capstone - Gesture Controlled Audio Software
projectsData.description:
Using an Action Recognition algorithm built with opencv,
       Audio may be mainpulated in real time with multiple effects
 that may be mapped to any gesture the user chooses to train.

projectsData.name: CSCE 3153 Laser Tag Software
projectsData.description:
Created a local laser tag game managment software using
 Pygame for the GUI and Heroku for the DB in Python.

projectsData.name: Simple Binary Neural Network
projectsData.description:
Neural Network training algorithm in Python, using Numpy and Matplotlib
 libraries. The code trains a neural network to predict binary
 targets based on input vectors, and includes visualization of training error over iterations.

projectsData.name: TCP Banking System
projectsData.description:
A simple banking system implemented using TCP sockets in Python.
 It consists of two main files: server.py and client.py. The server.py
 file contains the server-side implementation, while the client.py file contains the client-side implementation.
